text: Laszlo Levente Balatoni (29 January 1910 – 18 August 2000), alias Levente Ladislas Balatony, was a Hungarian alpine skier who competed in the inaugural alpine skiing event in the 1936 Winter Olympics. He finished 38th among 66 competitors. He became a naturalised UK citizen in July 1955 and was living there at the time of his death. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Hungarian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Hungary Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics
title: Levente Balatoni
